Description:
Classically Great

Canada’s favourite popcorn brand is not only delicious, it is also air popped for full, fresh tasting flavour and made with 100% whole grain corn. When you want it… you gotta have it! Always great tasting, it hits the spot every time. Try all of our great Smartfood® flavours.

 

Delightfully Delicious

Canada’s favourite popcorn brand brings you the mouthwatering taste you love with only 35 calories per cup! New Smartfood® Delight popcorn is a good source of fibre, made with 100% whole grain premium corn and seasoned with great flavours. It has no trans fat, no artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. Open a bag of this fresh-tasting, air-popped popcorn and prepare to be delighted. Try all our Smartfood® Delight popcorn flavours!
